content:
The CG IG uses MedicationStatement in references and gets the following Exception:

org.hl7.fhir.exceptions.FHIRException: Cannot find definition for MedicationUsage
        at org.hl7.fhir.r5.renderers.ProfileDrivenRenderer.render(ProfileDrivenRenderer.java:110)
        at org.hl7.fhir.r5.renderers.ProfileDrivenRenderer.render(ProfileDrivenRenderer.java:99)
        at org.hl7.fhir.r5.renderers.ResourceRenderer.build(ResourceRenderer.java:55)
        at org.hl7.fhir.r5.renderers.BundleRenderer.render(BundleRenderer.java:298)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.getXhtml(Publisher.java:7841)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.saveDirectResourceOutputs(Publisher.java:7169)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generateHtmlOutputs(Publisher.java:6609)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generate(Publisher.java:4873)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.createIg(Publisher.java:884)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.execute(Publisher.java:728)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.main(Publisher.java:8373)
We don't mention MedicationUsage once in the whole IG: https://github.com/HL7/genomics-reporting/search?q=MedicationUsage&type=
So I'm assuming this is a bug in the publisher during the translation to R5, as MedicationUsage is the new Name for MedicationStatement
this is rather difficult for me to fix, actually
actually, no. not that hard. fixed next release. which might be today, if we win the battle with maven
Thank you Grahame! :octopus:

I'm seeing this message when I run the SDC build. I don't know if it causes any significant issues (nothing I've noticed), but it probably indicates something's going wrong, given that SDC is a 4.0.1 IG...
Error Generating Narrative for MedicationUsage/f59e4516-d2c6-4a2f-936b-d2c460bb92c6: Cannot find definition for MedicationUsage
org.hl7.fhir.exceptions.FHIRException: Cannot find definition for MedicationUsage
at org.hl7.fhir.r5.renderers.ProfileDrivenRenderer.render(ProfileDrivenRenderer.java:115)

at org.hl7.fhir.r5.renderers.BundleRenderer.render(BundleRenderer.java:298)

at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.main(Publisher.java:9099)
